sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In a visit to Lampedusa, EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen promises Italy's Premier Giorgio Maloney her backing in the migrant crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A show of solidarity following the collapse of two dams in the Libyan city of Durna on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Residents from nearby cities are volunteering their support.

sentences.sentence: Siamo di fronte a una portataItalia alla fine della crisi migratoria, c'erano promesse di supporto da Brussels. With Italy at the sharp end of the migrant crisis, there were promises of support from Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Migration is a European challenge and it needs a European answer and solution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It is concrete actions that will bring change on the ground.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It is only through solidarity and unity that we can achieve this and you can count on the European Union. But the scale of the crisis is testing that unity. The Italian government says 127,000 people have made the crossing to Italy this year, twice as many as in the same period last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Derna, a port city in eastern Libya once famous for its lush gardens and canals, now in ruins.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: One week ago, two dams above the city burst due to heavy rains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: More than 11,000 people are reported dead and 10,000 are still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Collective grief has morphed into a rallying cry for unity in a country blighted by 12 years of conflict and division.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The oil-rich country is divided between the internationally recognized government in Tripoli and a rival authority in the East since 2014.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: ولكن يظل العمل الإنساني هو الأعلى قيمة وهو الذي يجمع ويربط بين كل الليبيين المواطنين في مدينة ليبيا يدعون أنهم يدعون للحرارة للمرضى لكن المجموعة الأدوية تقول أن تحديد المواد الأساسية تتحرك في مكان مخلص ومع مدى مقاومة من المواد الأساسية تتحرك في المناطق الأساسية تنظر إلى المناطق المتأخرة ويبقى مفهوماً كيف سيحرم المناطق worst affected areas. Looking ahead, it remains unclear how authorities will rehome the population.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Poland has begun to enforce an EU ban on all Russian registered passenger cars seeking to enter the country. It's the latest in a series of sanctions on Moscow in punishment for its war

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: against Ukraine. Poland shares the land border with the Russian territory of Kaliningrad, an exclave separated from the Russian mainland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The move comes just days after the nearby Baltic states of Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia enforced similar bans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Dmitry Medvedev, the deputy head of Russia's Security Council, denounced the European Commission's move as racist.

sentences.sentence: On Ruski Island in Russia's Far East, North Korean leader Kim Jong-un saw locally produced military equipment at the end of his six-day visit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: North Korean state media said its president's earlier meetings with Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu had expanded the strategic and tactical coordination between the two countries.

sentences.sentence: A band played as Kim Jong-un left for Pyongyang on his armoured train.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Doing their bit in the war against waste.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Paris, volunteers took to the streets armed with bin bags and litter pickers, giving up their afternoon in hope of a tidier neighbourhood on World Cleanup Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In Romania, teams took the fight outside the city limits to sort through piles of dumped waste left to fester on the side of country roads. We found everything we could find, clothes, old cell phones, we found mannequins for clothes, we found a lot of sanitary objects, unfortunately we threw the garbage away after construction, as we saw, a lot of plastic, a lot of glass.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And it was much the same on Venezuela's ocean beaches, where environment-conscious citizens

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: sifted through waste that had been left or washed ashore.
